thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Joyce

author: Joyce
title: Joyce
text: Vered, our travel agent worked very hard to ensure this last minute trip was successful. The travel arrangements she made were excellent and all prebooked excursions, transfers, and the ferry trip were on time and efficient. the upgraded room at the Manava Suite Resort in Papeete was weel worth the extra money as we had a beautiful studio suite with a lagoon view and the ocean breeze to keep the balcony comfortable for sitting. The garden view room in Manava Pearl Beach Resort, Moorea was good. Our only complaint is that the these rooms are very protected from the ocean breezes making the balconies very hot and close. The breakfasts in Moorea were amazing with a good selection of hot and cold dishes.
